'''Behold, Mine Evil-Espying Eye!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to completely interpret all clues in ''[[The Exorcist's Path#On The Evil Spirits' Trail|On The Evil Spirits' Trail]].''

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement references the idiom {{zh|慧眼识珠|rm=huìyǎn shìzhū|lit=intelligent eyes recognize pearls}}, used to describe people with a good eye for potential.
